column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I love this place!  Whenever I have a few days in Chicago I always try and arrange a visit to this restaurant.  You can be dressed in a suit or in jeans
column2: it doesn't matter.  All are welcome and comfortable at this melting pot environment. Tapas choices are many and the food is excellent.  Prices are reasonable and even though they are "small plates" I always leave here feeling stuffed!
